channel.title: Master Command Error Please Reply!

item.title: Master Command Error Please Reply!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

It needs to be >= not just > then

} if (c.Rights >= 0) { if (cmd.startsWith("pickup")) { String[] args = cmd.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID < 20000) { c.addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.Send("No such item."); } } else { c.Send("Wrong Syntax! Please use it as ::pickup [ID] [AMOUNT]."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Master Command Error Please Reply!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Base: Nitroxscape
Error: None there seems to be no errors but it just wont allow it.
Explanation: Ok Below i will post the code and specifics but…for now, the master command was on the server when i got it and i have tried to edit the server to make pickup avalable to all. But…the problem is when i change the p.rights to 0 nothing happens. But it still works for admins
The Command is in a file called commands much like the 508 layout.

This is the command

} if (c.Rights >= 2) { if (cmd.equals("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.addSkillXP(13036000, i); }

Original command
}
if (cmd.equals(“master”)) {
for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
c.addSkillXP(13036000, i);
}

Please Reply or add Tjm_94@live.co.uk to personally help me.
